name: "At Least We're Not in Jail" DVD
description:
Just as the world is losing its mind over the Cru being on hiatus, this new DVD shot during their last tour should satiate us at least temporarily. And it comes with downloadable demos of what was to be the new followup record to their acoustic EP. The songs are more aggressive and concise, and the video footage is a great addition to their catalog. Features:
  • “HIT THE ROAD” documentary
  • Full Greenwoodstock 2006 performance
  • Live footage music videos
  • Photo gallery
  • Much more
